title: How ideology shaped Nazi foreign policy 1933-45

content.question:
Write an essay that:

Has a relevant thesis.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze various ways in which ideology shaped the foreign policy of Nazi Germany in the period 1933 through 1945.

Addresses all parts of the question.

Supports thesis with specific evidence.

Is well organized.

Analyze various ways in which ideology shaped the foreign policy of Nazi Germany in the period 1933 through 1945.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
